title: Research in the Health and Social Care Sector
headline: Explore useful evaluation tools for effective decision-making in the healthcare industry with this free online course.
description: Do you want to implement corporate goals for growth and success in your organisation? This short course will examine the principles of effective decision-making in health and social care. The steps that enable managers to solve problems and the approaches to gather and analyze data, explore alternatives and decide on a course of action will be outlined. Enrol in this course if you need to translate your business objectives into action plans.
courseDescription:
Are you in management with immense responsibilities to implement your corporate goals? Alpha Academy designed this course with the aim of equipping you with decision-making skills and tools.  Making decisions is a process that results in the best outcome which gives direction to a whole group; Discover the tools for gathering information and weighing potential alternatives and how to correctly set success criteria and analyse the potential impact of choices.

Next, we will discuss the concept of clarifying the purpose of a decision. This is important because a leader must be pragmatic when confronted with a wide range of circumstances. The lessons, therefore, will explore logical and analytical approaches to dealing with issues and how best to utilise each approach to determine the best course of action. You will appreciate the fundamentals of smart decision-making that guide the implementation of effective solutions.

Another important management practice is considering others' views and advice also known as employee involvement or participative management so that employees have a say in how their work is carried out. Explore business objectives which dictate how the organisation should exploit its strengths and opportunities. Finally, discover the ABC Solutions Generation Process for problem-solving. If you seek to keep growing professionally in management, then this course is for you. Sign up today.
